Title: Pretty Good Bootstrap Base Theme Orchard Theme
Description: An Orchard base theme building on Twitter's Bootstrap framework.
HomeWiki:
Project Description
An Orchard base theme building on Twitter's Bootstrap framework.

This repository has moved to GitHub. Please visit the new repository at https://github.com/Lombiq/Pretty-Good-Bootstrap-Base-Theme.

The CodePlex page is not maintained anymore, but still here for historical reference.

We've also created a complete sample theme demonstrating what you can do with PGBBT.

PGBBT is the base for the themes of all Lombiq websites, including Lombiq.com, Orchard Dojo and DotNest.com. The theme is also available for all DotNest sites.

This project is developed by Lombiq Technologies Ltd. Commercial-grade support is available through Lombiq.

The theme is also available for DotNest sites.
